Peter,

What is your fitness function in this domain?  Sometimes it looks 
=
like individuals are assigned a fitness of 0.00000 yet when I look at 
them=
 it looked like they were balanced for a while.  What is causing 
them to g=
et zero fitness?

Of course the fitness function in this domain can be tric=
ky since 
what you want to encourage is balance, which is not necesarily al=
ways 
correlated to duration standing (e.g. when someone is flailing 
aroun=
d).

ken
